translation: A few days ago, I got a call from one of the boys from my class, "Xing Jiawen, I heard that you are going to give a speech titled Boys Are Useless on the 29th day."
transcript: 前两天有男同学给我来电话，问我，刑佳雯，听说你二十九号要去演讲“男生是废物”啊。

translation: What an overblown worry it is. Life is short. If boys really are useless, why do we girls waste our time saving them?
transcript: 你们想想，如果男生真是废物，人生短暂，我们女生还会这么尽心尽力地拯救他们吗？

translation: Actually, there is a story behind this call.
transcript: 这个电话有个背景。

translation: Last year we held a class meeting themed on Saving the Boys.
transcript: 去年我们班搞了一个主题班会，拯救男生。

translation: Even studying in the best class in my school, one of the decent schools in Shanghai, we girls still often come across such things.
transcript: 我们学校也算是上海市不错的学校了，我们班则是全年级成绩最好的班，但是我们经常发现这些现象。

translation: For example, we girls have to make all the PPTs for classroom activities and write the scripts for textbook-based dramas, and we were always the last to leave on cleaning days while the boys were nowhere to be seen.
transcript: 比如班级活动里做ppt的活都是女生全包；课本剧活动，写剧本的永远都是女生；打扫班级卫生坚持到最后的也都是女生，男生呢，早就不知所踪了。

translation: What's more, we outperform the boys in exams.
transcript: 就连成绩也往往是女生更胜一筹。

translation: As a result, girls and teachers can't help wondering: where are the good boys?
transcript: 于是，广大女生们和老师不禁深感忧虑，纷纷发问我们的好男生都去哪儿了？

translation: Therefore, we held a class meeting themed on "Saving the Boys".
transcript: 于是“拯救男生”主题班会顺利出炉。

translation: Compelled by the pressure of the theme, every boy in my class seemed to "come forward" and gabbled about how to be a good boy, and his plans about the future.
transcript: 每个男生都压力很大的貌似主动的发言，谈自己应该怎么成为一个好男生，谈自己对未来的打算。

translation: They even invited my father, whom they thought to be a role model of successful man, to the meeting to share his opinions.
transcript: 甚至他们还邀请到了我老爸作为成功男人给大家演讲。

translation: Well, I don't think he's that successful.
transcript: 当然我并不太认为他是一个多么成功的人。

translation: Neverthelss, I do hope he set an example for the boys in my class and encouraged them to be better men.
transcript: 嗯，希望他做一个成功人士能够给男生们树立一个榜样，激励大家。

translation: On the meeting, the girls cited examples from the past and modern days, so to speak, the whole meeting was full of our sincere care and expectations for the boys.
transcript: 而我们女生呢，则是旁征博引，谈古论今，可以说整场班会凝聚了我们女生对于男生的殷切期盼和关怀。

translation: As an ending note, the girls and teachers all agreed that the meeting was a huge success.
transcript: 结束了以后，我们女生们和老师一致认为这场班会大获成功。

translation: After the meeting, we held inspiring events, such as the Top 10 Good Boys, asking the girls to vote for the good boys in their eyes.
transcript: 后来我们还举行了包括女生票选十大好男生之类的活动，让女生来投票选举好男生，多么能鼓舞男生啊。

translation: As a old saying goes, "only time will tell."
transcript: 听说时间是检验感情投入的最好方式。

translation: Regrettably, one year after the meeting, the girls are still toiling over PPTs.
transcript: 果然，一年后的今天，我们的女生还在辛苦地做ppt。

translation: Last August, I joined a coming-of-age ceremony in the Gobi Desert.
transcript: 去年八月，我参加了戈壁成人礼。

translation: In the sorching hot season, me and other nearly 70 teenagers my age from other places in China revisited the toughest part that Xuanzang, a Chinese monk who travelled to India in the seventh century for Buddhist scriptures, had travelled through in his journey to the west.
transcript: 在那个骄阳流火的季节里，我和全国近七十位少年一起踏上了戈壁，踏上了当年玄奘西行取经最艰难的一段路。

translation: We had to travel 88 kilometers in just 4 days.
transcript: 四天要完成八十八公里。

translation: As a head student for years and the mastermind of Saving the Boys, I had already prepared to be a tough girl in the journey.
transcript: 毕竟是做了好几年的班长，毕竟是经历了轰轰烈烈的拯救男生行动，因此早在上戈壁之前我就已经做好了成为戈壁女汉子的心理准备。

translation: I started to worry since the first day in the Gobi Desert, as I found that the boys  significantly outnumbered the girls and they assumed all the key posts, such as team leader, the standard-bearer, etc.
transcript: 当登上了戈壁，我发现队伍里男生的人数远远多于女生，而且担任队长、旗手等等的也无一不是男生，我开始忧虑我的团队。

translation: A boy nicknamed "tights" for being one of the thinnest boys in the team was our scout .
transcript: 我们队有个绰号叫“紧身衣”的，他是全队最瘦弱的男生之一，也是我们的先锋。

translation: In the middle of our journey, we got lost and no one was sure where to go.
transcript: 有一次，我们有点迷路了，不知道之后应该怎么走。

translation: He came forward and volunteered to scout the way ahead.
transcript: 这个时候他主动请缨说，让我去探路吧。

translation: His heoric act worried us all because it's dangerous to be lost in a wild and sandy desert.
transcript: 要知道在戈壁这种举目狂沙的地方，你要是真走丢了，那可不是闹着玩儿的。

translation: Despite of all the potential dangers, he went on his way.
transcript: 但是他还是上路了。

translation: When his thin figure appeared alongside a huge rock, we all got excited.
transcript: 当他瘦小的身影再一次出现在某一块巨石旁边的时候，我们真的都激动了。

translation: With his help we were finally able to go back on the right path.
transcript: 当他们为我们传来捷报，带我们走回正路的时候。

translation: I was deeply impressed by his courage and devotion to the team.
transcript: 我深深地为他给团队的奉献和他的勇气而打动。

translation: The other boy I want to talk about is our team leader.
transcript: 另外一位是我们的队长。

translation: We didn't follow the tradition to elect the leader by voting on the candidates' speeches.
transcript: 我们队比较独特，当初选队长，并不是凭演讲、凭公平竞争。

translation: Instead, we picked out a man who looks most experienced and prudent.
transcript: 而是刷脸，也就是，我们选择了一位长得最沉稳老成的人来当队长。

translation: His name is Ling Feng,a boy who is shy and quiet.
transcript: 他就是我们的凌风同学，他其实是一个比较腼腆，不太爱讲话的人。

translation: The main duty of the leader is to wrap things up, so Ling Feng had to stay at the tail of the team, never having the chance to be the first to reach the finishing line.
transcript: 队长的工作主要是收尾，所以说他每天都要走在队伍的最末端，从来没有体会过第一个冲线的喜悦、自豪。

translation: Furthermore, he had to take care of the wounded and remind other members to saty hydrated.
transcript: 此外他还要协助领队照顾伤员，提醒队员及时补水。

translation: At the same time, he had to be the liaison, always carrying portable chargers and the medical kit with him.
transcript: 充当对讲机、充电宝、移动药箱等等。

translation: Despite of the heavy and complicated tasks, he never complained to us.
transcript: 工作非常繁琐也很疲劳，但是在他沉稳老成的脸上，我们从来没有读出过抱怨。

translation: The list of similar stories in the desert goes on and on.
transcript: 在戈壁上类似的男生故事还有很多。

translation: In our journey, those brave boys were exactly the heroes we expected them to be.
transcript: 那时他们真的都成了我们女生心中所期待的男子汉形象。

translation: Thanks to their dedication, we were able to feel safe and protected as if we were roses in the desert, only without thornes.
transcript: 那时我们女生也就安心扮演戈壁小玫瑰，而且这是戈壁玫瑰最美好的时候，因为还没长刺儿呢。

translation: Speaking of the word "role", it simply means what we think we are and how we act accordingly.
transcript: 说呀有角色这么一个词，简单来讲角色就是指一个人认为他自己是什么，并采取了怎样的一种行为模式。

translation: At the thought of words like the Gobi Desert, independence and man, even the boys who set out on their first journey in the desert would man up unconsciously to protect the girls.
transcript: 戈壁、独立、汉子，女生需要被保护，一想象到这些词汇，即使是刚刚踏上戈壁的男生也会情不自禁地变成一个男子汉。

translation: See, the role is so magical that it can change our behavioral patterns.
transcript: 这就是角色的魅力，它能够改变一个人的行为模式。

translation: But here comes another question, that is, why do "tights" and the leader have better performance than the rest of the boys in my team?
transcript: 可是这里又出现一个问题了，为什么紧身衣和队长能够在这些男子汉里面表现得更为优秀呢？

translation: In order to solve this problem, I will introduce another term, role definition.
transcript: 还有一个词叫角色定位，一个无可替代的定位，就叫做角色定位。

translation: Role definition means the particular position or function you have in a situation or in the society.  In my team, "tights" is not just a boy, but also the one and only scout.
transcript: 在戈壁上、在我们的队伍里，紧身衣所担当的角色并不仅仅是一个男子汉，更是我们的先锋，这个角色只有他是。

translation: This is exactly his role definition.
transcript: 这个独一无二的角色就是他的角色定位。

translation: This is the same case with my leader.
transcript: 而我们的队长也是如此。

translation: Being the only leader in that team, Ling Feng has to fulfill many duties by himself.
transcript: 凌风所要担当的角色是队长，因此很多事情，都只能由他来完成。

translation: Being unique and irreplaceable, that's the definition of the roles of those two boys.
transcript: 独一无二、无可替代，这就是角色定位。

translation: By playing an irreplaceable role, one can transcend from being good to being excellent.
transcript: 因为无可替代的角色定位，我们能够使优秀的变成卓越。

translation: If I recall correctly, I earned my place as the head student first when I was in the 6th grade.
transcript: 记得我真正的班长生涯应该是从六年级算起的。

translation: At that time, the head student was required to write a brief summary every week, and read it out on every Monday.
transcript: 当时班长被要求在每周写一篇班级小结，然后在周一的时候拿到讲台上去念。

translation: It's hard to forget the first time I stood at the podium, holding a tiny summary paper in my hand.
transcript: 我永远忘不了，六年级的我第一次拿着那张轻薄的班级小结走上班级的讲台时。

translation: My heart beat so hard and I felt like there was a rabbit jumping furiously in my chest.
transcript: 心里像揣了兔子一般紧张的情景。

translation: The only thing I could do at that moment was keep telling myself "you are the head student".
transcript: 但当时我在心里对自己大喊，你是班长，是班长啊。

translation: It took me one week to overcome that nervousness.
transcript: 就这样喊了一周以后，我不再紧张了。

translation: As we moved to higher grade levels, I often had to stay up late at night tending the class affairs, after which I had to finish enormous schoolwork before going to bed.
transcript: 后来年级升高，作业量加大，每天完成班级的工作，常常就已经到深夜了，这个时候我再面对大量的作业。

translation: Looking at the elementary exercises I had done for countless times, sometimes I really wanted to muddle through them by copying answers.
transcript: 看着里面那些做了千遍万遍的基础题，有的时候真的想一抄了之。

translation: It is said that staying up late will accelerate the ageing of a woman.
transcript: 听说女人经常熬夜会变老。

translation: That's definitely something I want to avoid as a young girl.
transcript: 我还不想这么早变老呢。

translation: Whenever I want to take a quick look at the answers,  a voice would scream in my heart, "you are the head student".
transcript: 但是每当我的眼睛瞟向答案的时候，总有一个声音在我心底掠过，你是班长，是班长啊。

translation: It is this voice that saved me from dishonoring my title.
transcript: 我怎么能对不起班长这两个字呢。

translation: Then, I accepted the truth that I might age faster than my classmates.
transcript: 于是，我坦然地接受了我似乎是要比别人更早变老的事实。

translation: Little did I know about role definition at that time, but now whenver I look back on that experience, I can be sure this is the magic of role definition.
transcript: 当时我还不知道角色定位的概念，但是现在想起来，觉得这确实是角色定位的魅力。

translation: It is with that magic one can forge ahead, havingt hesitation or regret, and withstand the tear and wear of time.
transcript: 它能够使一个人在他的道路上无怨无悔义无反顾地走下去，并且永远无惧于一切辛风苦雨。

translation: Are boys really in need of salvation?
transcript: 男生真的需要拯救吗？

translation: In my eyes, all we need to do is tell them that they are men, pioneers and leaders.
transcript: 在我看来，只要我们告诉他们，你是男人、是先锋、是队长就足够了。
